short_summary: The Canada School of Public Service requires simultaneous interpretation services for upcoming events. Up to two contracts will be awarded, with a total budget of $631,500.00, excluding taxes.
description: The procurement is subject to various trade agreements, including the Canadian Free Trade Agreement and the Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement. The contracts will be awarded on a Best Value basis, considering factors such as the presence of language rights requirements. Sessions will be held at various physical locations and online via the Zoom platform. The tenders were originally set to close on November 14th, 2022, but the deadline has passed. The description and attachment links are available in English and French.

full_summary:
## Concurrent Request for Proposal: Interpreting Services

### Tender Details

* **Title:** Simultaneous Interpretation Services
* **Reference Number:** PW-22-01009118
* **Solicitation Number:** CSPS-RFP-22JP-0501/A
* **Deadline for Submission:** November 14th,  2022, 2:00 PM EST

### Background

The Canada School of Public Service (CSPS) seeks to establish a service requirement for simultaneous interpretation services in English and/or French for upcoming events organized by CSPS on an "as and when requested" basis. The contracts will be awarded competitively and will be valid for a period of one year from the contract award date. Three (3) one-year extensions are also available for each contract, for a total potential contract value of $631,500.

### Requirements

The successful contractor will provide simultaneous interpretation services for various events organized by the CSPS. The interpretation services will be required in both English and French. The contractor will be responsible for providing the necessary equipment and personnel to meet the CSPS's requirements. 

Security clearance is a requirement for this procurement.

### Evaluation Criteria

The tentative evaluation criteria for this procurement are:

* Technical Capability
* Past Performance
* Price

### Important Compliance Information

The contract for this procurement will be subject to the provisions of the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), the Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement, the Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP), the Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, the Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), the Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, the Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement, the North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA), the Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, the Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement, the Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement and the World Trade Organization-Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO-AGP).

For additional information, please refer to the attached bid package: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/10/04/955cf7cead38683cfa9ab2ba8e133b77/rfp_simultaneous_interpretation_services.pdf

Please direct all inquiries to Jean-Pierre Archambault at jean-pierre.archambault@csps-efpc.gc.ca or 613-793-0364.
